last_episode_to_air.name: We’ve Had a Good Cry
last_episode_to_air.overview: The nobles and servants try to ensure their survival by making a deal with the mercenaries who are close to breaching the villa gates.

name: The Decameron
overview: As the bubonic plague spreads through Italy, a group of nobles and servants retreats to a villa, where their lavish getaway quickly spirals into chaos.

episodes.name: The Beautiful, Not-Infected Countryside
episodes.overview: As pestilence spreads through Florence, a group of self-centered nobles with secrets and hidden agendas flees to the countryside.

episodes.name: Holiday State of Mind
episodes.overview: Filomena’s arrival threatens Licisca’s plan. Pampinea grows desperate to find Leonardo while Neifile awaits divine intervention.

episodes.name: By Homer, It's a Winner's Wreath!
episodes.overview: Pampinea settles in as the lady of the house, Neifile and Panfilo receive unfortunate news and romance blossoms within the group.

episodes.name: The Mood Is Soiled
episodes.overview: A new guest threatens Pampinea’s position. Neifile learns the truth about her husband. Filomena tries to reclaim her identity.

episodes.name: Switcheroo
episodes.overview: The nobles and servants devise a plan to take back the villa from Ruggiero. While in exile, Licisca and Filomena try to reconcile their differences.

episodes.name: A Stony Brook Away
episodes.overview: Neifile and Panfilo open up to each other. Tindaro bonds with Stratilia’s son. Licisca and Filomena encounter a group of mercenaries.

episodes.name: This Is Awful, And You'll Never Recover
episodes.overview: Sirisco tries to rid the villa of Pampinea. Licisca comes to terms with her parentage. A new heir lays claim to the villa.

episodes.name: We’ve Had a Good Cry
episodes.overview: The nobles and servants try to ensure their survival by making a deal with the mercenaries who are close to breaching the villa gates.
